subject: Basketball
Education (K-12)
Juvenile Delinquency
Coaches and Managers
Series
lead_paragraph: Tonya Lutz, a high school basketball champion, faces an uphill battle as the Carroll Academy girls coach, but players see her as a stable, trustworthy role model, unlike anyone they know.
